message.raw:
As per BLACS [issue #13](#!/labscript_suite/blacs/issues/13/launch-blacs-as-a-secondary-control-system), this code provides a new syntax for defining the connections to remote workers and secondary control systems.

The syntax should be used as `SecondaryControlSystem('control2', 'bec-control2.physics.monash.edu:42518')` to define the connection to the secondary control system (similarly for remote worker brokers). To use this, then modify your usual device instantiation as so `NovaTechDDS9M('novatech1', my_clockline, com_port = control2('com14'))`
